attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Amend the current smoking regulations to allow for smoking rooms in public houses which do not serve food, as was the original suggestion to the voting public before the act was quietly changed with less publicity to a blanket ban. If Spain can recognise the human rights of addicted smokers then why can't this country.  In this country everyone seems to have a human right to live as they wish unless you are a smoker!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
